name: The Original Form of Dice is Die [GMTK GJ 2022]
name_original: The Original Form of Dice is Die [GMTK GJ 2022]
description:
Will you be able to navigate the four mazes?

Controls

WASD - Tilt the dice in the direction and go forth so many tiles
R - Restart
N - Skip Level
ESC - Exit Game

Credits

Programming: Vinzenz Prakoso
3D-Models and Animation: Maxime and Nicolas
Level Design: Jonas
Game Idea: Dominik, Jonas, Moritz, Maxime, Nicolas, Simone and Vinzenz

A game made in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.
